entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
